name: SwitchBoard Simulator
description:
Controls!

- left click and drag the ends of cables to move them around

- scroll wheel will move held object to and from the camera

- right click and drag to move the camera

How to play!

During your shift at the switchboard exchange, calls will come in and light up their address on  your wall of plugs. Connect that address to the microphone with the cables and click on the microphones response button to find out who the caller wants to be connected to. Connecting the caller to their recipient correctly will earn you a payout for a job well done! But be careful, failing to connect them, interrupting their call or connecting them to the wrong address will dock your earnings!

Have fun and see how much you can earn during your shift!

This game was made in a weekend as a part of the Camp Squiggly retreat in Feb 2022 with the theme 'Reconnection' and was polished up in the week following (there wasn't much to do after the weekend, it needed a lil' more trust me)
